The sea was the last brother to receive the gift of prophecy. It is said that when the sea received this gift, a little of each brotherly soul had escaped into it. The sea does not see things in black and white; the warm sun does not dry it. It looks at everything closely, understanding the connections between the waves, the clouds, and the sun.
